text: aqsm allah taealaa balryah hin thb mttabet yqfw bedha bedana, wbalryah alshadidat alhbwb almhlkt, wbalmlaykt almwklyn balshb yswqwnha hayth sha' allh, wbalmlaykt alty tunazil min eind allah bima yufraq bayn alhaqa walbatil walhlal walhram, wbalmlaykt alty ttlqa alwhy min eind allah wtnzl bih ealaa anbyayh; 'iedharana min allah 'iilaa khalaqah w'indharana minh 'ilyhm; lialaa yakun lahum hj. 'iina aladhi tueadun bih min 'amr yawm alqiamat wama fih min hisab wajaza' lnazl bikum la mhalt
